Dear White People

Ano: 2014

IMDb ID: tt2235108

Classificação: 6.2

Sinopse: A social satire that follows the stories of four black students at an Ivy League college where controversy breaks out over a popular but offensive black-face party thrown by white students. With tongue planted firmly in cheek, the film explores racial identity in acutely-not-post-racial America while weaving a universal story of forging one's unique path in the world.—Anonymous
